Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Ashburn in 1965...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/1969, off Bill Sill (PIL)...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1969...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1970, hitting .550 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 7/26/1970 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Troy on 7/17/1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1972, hitting .560 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Injured on 8/9/1972 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1972...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1973...
Drove in 6 runs against Longport on 6/24/1974...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1974...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1975...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1976, hitting .500 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Centerfield in 1976...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Lynchburg on 4/13/1979...
Injured on 5/26/1979 with a Broken Ribs, out for 3 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Halifax on 7/13/1979...
Signed as a free agent by Ashburn on 2/2/1980 to a 5-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1982, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
